meaningMnemonic: If you grind a <radical>stone</radical> down to more than just a <radical>few</radical> pieces, it will become <kanji>sand</kanji>. Stones that get broken up enough will become sand, and you pick up a few grains in your hand.
readingMnemonic: What’s in your hand? A few grains of <reading>sa</reading>nd (さ)! <kanji>Sand</kanji>, sand, sand!
